name: Film Empire Game
slogan: Explore the vibrant Hollywood world with the beauty of our film production simulator game
description:
It is a simulator strategy game for IOS iPhone, the game let players take on the role of ambitious producer, start from Mumbai and try to climb the leaderboards and move to LA. Embark on a compelling and emotional journey to unravel the benefits of becoming a successful Hollywood producer. And also design personal creative films to compete with other players worldwide on the box-office chart.
We offer this game to hundred million film lovers around the world to explore the vibrant Hollywood world.  As young film producers with low budgets need to produce the blockbuster which will bring them the most wanted fame.
Through the game players can always experience the magic of films and cinematic production process.
Our film game app is the first come to the market, so our short-term goal is to keep improving and marketing it to keep the game at the dominant position in the market. Which will increase the growth of user to absorb loads of attentions from advertisers and buyers.

team.name: Ryan Ren
team.bioHtml:
Ryan Ren is an entrepreneur, business developer and financials.
 He has gained various knowledge in business development, corporate finance, app development.
